Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Directs the office of children and family services to establish an outdoor, nature-based child care program
Summary: Directs the office of children and family services to establish an outdoor, nature-based child care program to allow for the operation of licensed outdoor, nature-based child care classrooms which provide early learning services for preschool or school-age children in an outdoor space and that employ a curriculum with nature to teach enrolled children.
LawCode: Amd ยง390, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to outdoor, nature-based child care
